sentences: Evelyn Amanda Davidson White (February 1, 1921 â€“ July 2, 2007) was an American author, vocal teacher and Howard University Choral Director.
White was born in Charlotte, North Carolina, to Rev. William H. Davidson, a Baptist minister, and Florence Gidney Davidson.
